products.name: Apple
products.desc: Apple inc. designs,manufactures, & markets smartphones,tablets, personal computers(PC), portable & wearable devices. The company also offers soft. & related services, accesories, networking solutions, & third party digital content & application

products.name: Microsoft
products.tagline: We believe in what people make possible
products.tagline2: We believe in what people make possible.
products.desc: Microsoft Corporation is an American multinational technology corporation producing computer software, consumer electronics, personal computers, and related services headquartered at the Microsoft Redmond campus located in Redmond, Washington, United States.

products.name: Google
products.tagline: Make life easier with a little help from our products.
products.tagline2: Make life easier with a little help from our products.
products.desc: Google is an American multinational technology company whose mission is to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful.

products.name: SpaceX
products.desc: SpaceX is an American spacecraft manufacturer, launcher, and a satellite communications corporation headquartered in Hawthorne, California.

products.name: Tesla
products.tagline2: Accelerate the advent of sustainable transport and electric technology.
products.desc: Tesla, Inc., formerly (2003 - 22) Tesla Motors, American manufacturer of electric automobiles, solar panels, and batteries for cars and home power storage.

products.name: Amazon
products.desc: Amazon.com, Inc. is an American multinational technology company focusing on e-commerce, cloud computing, online advertising, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence.

products.name: NASA
products.tagline: At NASA, we make Air & Space...
products.tagline2: At NASA, we make Air & Space available for everyone.
products.desc: National Administrative Space Association(NASA) is a U.S. government agency that is responsible for science and technology related to air and space. The Space Age started in 1957 with the launch of the Soviet satellite Sputnik.

products.name: YouTube
products.desc: YouTube is an American online video sharing and social media platform headquartered in San Bruno, California.

products.name: Walmart
products.desc: Walmart is an American multinational retail corporation that operates a chain of hypermarkets (also called supercenters), discount department stores, and grocery stores from the United States, headquartered in Bentonville, Arkansas.

products.name: boAt
products.desc: BoAt is an India-based company which was incorporated in November 2013. BoAt markets earphones, headphones stereos, travel chargers, and premium rugged cables.

products.name: PhonePay
products.desc: A Payments App built for India, by Indians! whose Vision is to build India's largest transaction platform anchored on payments.

products.name: TATA
products.tagline2: to give you a better experience.
products.desc: India's largest conglomerate, with products and services in over 150 countries, and operations in 100 countries across six continents. India's multinational conglomerate company headquartered in Mumbai.

products.name: PayPal
products.tagline2: A global community working together to make financial services and commerce more convinient, affordable, and secure.
products.desc: PayPal, American e-commerce company formed in March 2000 that specializes in Internet money transfers.

products.name: Adobe
products.desc: Adobe Systems Incorporated, is an American multinational computer software company incorporated in Delaware[3] and headquartered in San Jose, California.

products.name: Volkswagen
products.desc: Volkswagen Group, also called Volkswagen AG, major German automobile manufacturer, founded by the German government in 1937 to mass-produce a low-priced “people's car.” Headquarters are in Wolfsburg, Germany.

products.name: BMW
products.desc: Bayerische Motoren Werke(BMW) is a German multinational manufacturer of performance luxury vehicles and motorcycles headquartered in Munich, Bavaria, Germany. It is the world's leading manufacturer of premium automobiles and motorcycles, and provider of premium financial and mobility services.
